snippet: The man was hanging by a bedsheet, said Sheriff Marvin Lucas of Claiborne County, who added that it had not yet been determined if hanging had been the cause of death.
abstract: Federal, state and local authorities are investigating death of Otis James Byrd, black man found hanging from tree in Port Gibson, Miss; Byrd had been reported missing on March 2.
lead_paragraph: The man was hanging by a bedsheet, said Sheriff Marvin Lucas of Claiborne County, who added that it had not yet been determined if hanging had been the cause of death.

headline.main: Black Man’s Body Found Hanging From Tree in Mississippi
headline.print_headline: Black Man’s Body Is Found Hanging From Tree in South
